channel.title: Comments on: Yet Another Slack Account

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/04/09/yet-another-slack-account/#comment-4332">Jim</a>.
I'm glad they included that text in the invite email, otherwise I'd still be trying to figure out how to use my existing account(s).
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jim.

I’m glad they included that text in the invite email, otherwise I’d still be trying to figure out how to use my existing account(s).

item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description: I'm glad to know it's not just me. I assumed I'd done something wrong when I signed up for the first or second time, such that my accounts weren't co-mingleable on Slack.
item.content:encoded: I’m glad to know it’s not just me. I assumed I’d done something wrong when I signed up for the first or second time, such that my accounts weren’t co-mingleable on Slack.
